#include<stdio.h>
long long int nc3(long long int x)
{if(x<0)
{
return 0;}
 
return ((x+1)*(x+2)*(x+3)/6);
}
int main()
{ int t,n,a,b,c;
long long int ans;
 scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld",&n,&a,&b,&c);
 ans=nc3(n)-nc3(n-a-1)-nc3(n-b-1)-nc3(n-c-1)+nc3(n-a-b-2)+nc3(n-b-c-2)+nc3(n-c-a-2)-nc3(n-a-b-c-3);
printf("%lld\n",ans);
}
return 0;
}
